original_text: He replied, “Every plant that my heavenly Father has not planted will be pulled up by the roots.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 심은 것마다 내 하늘 아버지께서 심으시지 않은 것은 뽑힐 것이니

sentences.original_text: Every plant that my heavenly Father has not planted
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하늘 아버지께서 심지 아니하신 식물은

sentences.original_text: will be pulled up by the roots
